title: Video: TEL AVIV – Thriller
content:
Pop culture references, attractive girls smoking seductively and an overarching sense of ambiguity, UK duo TEL AVIV know their potential market, and play right into it’s arms.

So it’s hardly a unique concept for a video, and their sound isn’t pushing boundaries, yet what they do, they do with utter perfection in mind. What really intrigues me about Thriller is the slick, effervescent element to the track, verging upon classic 70’s glam-rock in style and mid-00’s euro-pop in precision, with the combination of both working effortlessly to form a poignant connection. Check out Thriller below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
